sentences.en: " How nice it would be if I make the eaves brighter! " he thought to himself.
sentences.cn: 亮堂一点多好 呢,他找了两个帮手,拎来一桶石灰.

sentences.en: A spider is weaving a web under the eaves.
At that time the pub I enjoyed most was the Recluse Eaves.
sentences.cn: 那个时候,我最喜欢的是延长路平型关路口的清平檐.

sentences.en: Birds had nested under the eaves.
Fabrication help closed type , conceal eaves style, fluffy, open style of canvas.
sentences.cn: 可制作成全封闭式 、 遮檐式 、 帆布蓬 、 敞开式.

sentences.en: Icicles are hanging from the eaves.
It looks like wild grass with long narrow eaves and small flowers.
sentences.cn: 它看起来像有长窄叶子和小共朵的野草.

sentences.en: Looking up at the eaves, Orchid muttered: " Why isn't Spring Maiden back yet? "
sentences.cn: 兰花向天井檐上张一张, 自言自语地说: “ 青姑娘还不回来 呢 !

sentences.en: Ridge Long gecko, carved wall carved eaves, the grand and spectacular.
sentences.cn: 脊龙壁虎, 檐雕墙刻, 宏伟而壮观.

sentences.en: Son with flying eaves, rafter length ratio is about five to two.
sentences.cn: 檐椽与飞子的长度之比约五比二.

sentences.en: The eaves of this deserted house have become the roost for pigeons.
sentences.cn: 这所无人住的房子的屋檐成了鸽子的歇息处.

sentences.en: The rain water drips from the eaves.
The swallows nested under the eaves.
The wind whistled through the eaves.
There were icicles hanging from the eaves.

trans.tran_en: the edges of a roof that stick out beyond the walls
